website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for enhancing backbends and then some, including added strengthening benefits.
pros: High marks for its overall quality and engineering
Despite wheel's rugged looks, its performance speaks for itself, helping users overcome fears of pain and injury while adding to veteran yogis' abilities
cons: Not all users are fans of the print

customer_reviews.title: Would like a replacement - there are some crudely patched defects and faded colors
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy it is; but chose this particular more expensive product for it's aesthetics as well; unfortunately found that there are some crudely patched defects on the inside and the edge; also the colors are faded in places where the film was incorrectly applied & stretched. I'd like to order a replacement but looks like this option is not available; would have to return and buy again...not sure what the chances are for receiving a better produced item. I may as well just return it and buy a cheaper model.
customer_reviews.author: Ik_a

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief! INSTANT! I’m shocked!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I cannot get over how amazing this product is! I have 3 bad disks in my lower back. I can’t use inversion tables because they hurt my knees. I took this wheel out of the box, tried it and found instant relief. If you or someone you know suffers from back pain, you need to try this. I was skeptical, not any longer. Beautiful colors, sturdy and fast shipping! I’m so happy LOL I can’t wait to use it in my yoga practice too!
customer_reviews.author: D. Fayard

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! Everyone needs one of these! I used it this am for the first time and had the best workout/stretch. My lower back was killing me when I woke up and almost didn't go to my mat but really wanted to play with this. So glad I did! I feel awesome! The quality is superb. Super strong and I love, love, love the design!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Whritenour

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design and function!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this particular one for my husband to assist in opening up his back/spine and shoulder area. He is the opposite of flexible and weighs about 200 lbs. He was doubtful (and I was amused) but it works like a charm. While he uses it to open his back and alleviate pressure from his spine, I've managed to steal it for my yoga practice and have replaced my previous one with this model because I love it so much. The design is awesome too! Our only issue is that the outer layer could stand to be a tad softer.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this sooner. I love it. I've been using it to help with my back stretches and so far so good. It's sturdy (I'm 5'2" 125) and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Princess S. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fun & healing too.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Doesn't take up much space. Looks good even if left out. Very good quality. Went to youtube for many videos. Using for pain in thigh, seems to help already. Bought many things rollers & such, this the cheapest & best yet. I'm thinking of getting as holiday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Cally-FL

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I’m incorporating more flexibility into my workouts and have been looking for something to help me stretch my back in functional way. This is perfect. I’ve had it since Sunday and I feel my rib cage coming out of my chest. I wish the insert would have had a link for actual workouts pertaining to the wheel. But-I guess I’ll keep trying to figure out how else I can use this. The design is beautiful-which is what made it stand out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheel of Wonder = thankful spine
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING. Best friend bought a more expensive brand and they are equal in quality. It holds the weight like a champ. My neck, spine, back, hips, SI joints have all gotten some fantastic stretching. Felt like a million bucks after just a few minutes slowly rolling. I can’t imagine anyone not liking it. Graphics were as shown. Some reviews said the pattern was defective but it’s not noticeable on such a wild pattern so that wasn’t a negative for me. My kids love it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Terrible print quality.
customer_reviews.text: It seems durable and the foam is soft but the print quality is terrible. The wrap has so many fades and the clear coat is rough with weird dry spots. Pretty bummed we picked a bright wheel to test for workshops we are hosting, we def will be purchasing a different brand for the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Asher

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my new yoga wheel
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new yoga wheel! I chose this wheel because the design is so adorable and matches up to my style. Its so sturdy and I love practicing with it. Highly recommend for anyone working on inversions or trying to core strengthen. Also great for flowy movements if you roll with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This will help your sex life!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great i love it! This product has nice rounded edges which make it a better choice over the other ones that are the same, If you look at the other ones the edge is more sharp and digs into your back, This one is nice and round.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Plastina

customer_reviews.title: Improved Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: I love this wheel so much! It has really helped me improve my flexibility and, as others have stated, is great to use after a long day of sitting at a desk. It looks exactly as the picture shows. The only thing I could complain about is that in one area a small piece of foam on the wheel raises out of place. However, I'm still giving the wheel 5 stars because all I have to do is press it back into place and it stays put the entire time I'm using it. That small imperfection doesn't effect my practice at all. This is an incredible product and I wish I had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Burt

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: First used a Yoga Wheel a week before buying this and I had to have it. Its really great especially because its not as low to the ground as a foam roller which is better for my back pain. This product is sturdy and I love the fun design inside. I will probably buy some as gifts for friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: William Hallman

customer_reviews.title: The diameter is a good size but I feel like it could have been ...
customer_reviews.text: The diameter is a good size but I feel like it could have been a little wider. But I’m a guy with broader shoulders. I’ve toppled over while doing a little backbend over it but that’s user error. My wife loves it and she’s a yogini
customer_reviews.author: Thrust84

customer_reviews.title: This yoga wheel is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga wheel. I would recommend it to anyone that already practices yoga. It's so colorful and easy to use, plus it has a cool workout guide. It has helped tremendously with my inversions.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Crass

customer_reviews.title: Keep rolling
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga wheel, it opens my chest up and helps with tension in my mid back. I love how sturdy, stylish & comfortable it is. I've compared prices and quality and this one is the best I've come across. I've had it for over 2yrs and it's still perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Prida

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Love this wheel. Use it often, especially for stretching my back, hips and pelvis. Very sturdy. Really like the colors inside the wheel. It’s exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovee
customer_reviews.text: Love this wheel. Extremely helpful in those deep bckbends or even a relaxation flow.
customer_reviews.author: Wubbzz

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my skeptical husband for Christmas. It's a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my skeptical husband for Christmas. It's a hit! Only issue he is having is figuring out how to pop his upper back.
customer_reviews.author: Lorfing

customer_reviews.title: Pretty artistic circle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife. I'm a hero thanks to this awesome yoga wheel. It is sturdy, round and has art on it. I like it, the wife loves it. Can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Strong support for backbends
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my sister. It's very strong, solidly made. Best part was how she just smiled and smiled when she got it.
customer_reviews.author: Paradox Dancer

customer_reviews.title: I stretch out with this wheel and it feels so good, especially after a long day
customer_reviews.text: I have back problems and do yoga 3 times a week. In between my yoga workouts, I stretch out with this wheel and it feels so good, especially after a long day.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and the quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! I use it to stretch my ancient and aching back. I really need to get into yoga, but beer just tastes so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lasers

customer_reviews.title: This is a really beautiful and well-crafted yoga wheel
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful and well-crafted yoga wheel! It's sturdy enough for me to sit on, at 230lbs, and the padding lines are consistent and even all the way round. My only gripe is, and I can't tell if it happened in manufacturing or shipping, but there are some scratches along the sides, but it's not even really noticeable enough for me to send it back. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gobel

customer_reviews.title: Pain Reliever
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for people who are top heavy and have upper back issues!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my yoga wheel. I have not incorporated it into my yoga routine only in stretching my back. It’s WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice, not as balanced as others.
customer_reviews.text: I used my friends yoga wheel with no problems. This wheel is not as balanced and is wobbly when using. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was excited to get this yoga wheel as I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this yoga wheel as I practice the Hatha Yoga [original indian] but I must say this wheel is too hard for my back and after just a few tries it stopped using it as it hurt my back.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Love my yoga wheel!
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga wheel. It feels great on my back, it’s beautiful and I think it will help me reach my goal of a back end this year. There was a small issue with the packaging that was not the companies fault, but their customer service blew me away, prompt, kind, above and beyond. I add something to my home gym every year and I am so glad I chose this!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: I really like this wheel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wheel! the textured exterior makes gripping easy, and it is very strong! I can do standing poses on it without any concern that it wont hold me. I have been using it to improve inversions, back bends and correct upper back pain from my desk job!
customer_reviews.author: Frannie

customer_reviews.title: Feel 2 inches taller!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my back! Took it to work where all the ladies in my office wanted to try it. Now they all stop by ask if they can borrow it for a few miniutes! Only reason i give it four stars is that the inner side of the wheel looks nothing like pictured. It is a faded and streched version. Looks like it has been sitting in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Mio King

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Grippy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and Grippy! The wheel is an awesome prop to have in your yoga practice. Great for safely practicing backbends with support, adding and extra layer of effort, or taking a deeper stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great For
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS THING! Great for back bends and headstands, but I’ve also sort of experimented on my own and found some great stretches from this contraption. All in all, I’ve found this wheel to be a wonderful addition to restorative poses that help me unwind after long serving shifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to help stretch. Doesn’t slip on a hardfloor
customer_reviews.author: Tara L

customer_reviews.title: Great condition
customer_reviews.text: My son is trying to do backflips and he's been playing around with the wheel. As for me I use it for my workouts and stretches
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Olea

customer_reviews.title: Life changing! My chiropractor said, "You haven't been in for awhile!"
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite toy! I am using this daily before I leave the office to open up my back before my drive home. Sometimes I am rewarded by a lovely pop, pop, pop, pop, pop! Aahhhhh!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya B

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this!! Incredible, saves me a trip to the chiropractor. Great information on use with pictures of yoga poses. Strong and durable. Love the design!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, solid construction. Holds up under a lot of weight
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bali!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this Evo wheel. So far on the first day I was able to do a full headstand and it has also helped increase strength in my backbends. It's very durable and has great color scheme!
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: Works really good.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly strong. I thought it wouldn't hold too much weight but it holds up really good.
customer_reviews.author: shane yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect and super cute. I'm still a beginner yogi and have been having fun learning with this wheel.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My backed popped the first time I layed back on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany O’Rorke

customer_reviews.title: Feels wonderful on my back
customer_reviews.text: I can't rage about this thing enough. Feels wonderful on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Nire321

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I love this wheel. I have been using this for quite some time and it has helped my flexibility tremendously! It is super strong but it's also comfortable to use as well. I am so glad I came across this!
customer_reviews.author: TalishaBell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has taken me to the next level in my practice :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Inthavong

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great print!
customer_reviews.text: Great invention really helps with poses that I had trouble with before
customer_reviews.author: Millicent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I was looking for. Helps stretch my back after sitting at a desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the Bali print yoga wheel and I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Bali print yoga wheel and I LOVE IT!!! It’s easier to use if you’ve tried forearm and tripod headstands prior to buying the wheel. But it also helps get deeper stretches in! Definitely a must buy for all you yogi’s out there!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Love love love❤️ This is the first wheel I've gotten ...
customer_reviews.text: Love love love❤️ This is the first wheel I've gotten and I'm loving it! Great price for the quality and it's cute!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Lankford

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use my wheele daily to stretch my back. It’s solid and the rubber gripping surrounding it prevents slipping. I also love that this is colorful
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the workout it gave me, so much better than I was expecting. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fun print, brought color to the studio, well made, get one because they sell out!
customer_reviews.author: Anatomy of Movement

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: Using this just a few minutes a day has loosened my back up significantly. I feel better and have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It has definitely enhanced my practice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a few days ago, arrived in a timely manner. I love it! It has definitely enhanced my practice. 10/10 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this yoga wheel. Super comfy, and I love that it comes with a small guide to help you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! Just what i expected- I use it after ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Just what i expected- I use it after I run to decompress my spine. (I get back pain after long runs). I just kind of roll my spine over it slowly and gently like the instructions show, and it's really made a difference. Also, it's sturdy enough for a woman, but my 180 lb boyfriend (who has no yoga experience and may have been a little uneasy using this device) regardless said he felt like it didn't fully support him, so it may be not as supportive for the broad-shouldered set.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wheel! It’s like going to the chiropractor every morning. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Hept

customer_reviews.title: Felt so good! Find your center and just relax
customer_reviews.text: I sit hunched over for work in a tiny chair in a salon, and just laying on this gave my back relief. Felt so good! Find your center and just relax :)
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Trull

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and seems to be the perfect size when I’m using it. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Howells

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing relief for back discomfort. A great assist for yoga inversions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a Christmas present and I did try it and like the way it performed (note) hopefully the DVD will ...
customer_reviews.text: It is going to be a Christmas present and I did try it and like the way it performed (note) hopefully the DVD will come before christmas
customer_reviews.author: Florentene H.

customer_reviews.title: My sister loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. My sister loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Iman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The wheel is very strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: bridget

customer_reviews.title: Great help to work on your posture.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Love it! Helps open up the chest and relieve back pain!! I use it daily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter who is yoga teacher. She loves it, the design is also very fun
customer_reviews.author: Twyla Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It is a great tool to go deeper into backbends🕉
customer_reviews.author: Julia Leischner

customer_reviews.title: Love this wheel!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to take it out of the box. Very well made. Love using it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Traba

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST THING CAN HAPPEN TO SOMEONE IS TO PAY FOR ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISSAPOINTED WITH THIS YOGA WHEEL...I WAS SO EXCITED TO GET IT AND WHEN IT ARRIVED I FIND SCRATCHES ALL OVER...THE WORST THING CAN HAPPEN TO SOMEONE IS TO PAY FOR SOMETHING NEW AND IT APPEARS TO BE OLD AND USED.
customer_reviews.author: Eva V.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this wheel due to its good reviews. It just came in the mail and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wheel due to its good reviews. It just came in the mail and I am very disappointed. The plastic design is faded, scuffed, and chipped. I will be returning for one that isn't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Wheel is good
customer_reviews.text: Im happy with the wheel itself but unhappy with the fact it came in the box revealing what it was. It was a gift for my daughter and she def saw it and it was a waste of a surprise. The box was torn even as if someone tried tearing into it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

product_meta.title: Yoga EVO 13’’ Yoga Wheel – Strong & Comfortable Dharma Yoga Prop for Inversions & Backbends - Stretching Plexus Wheel
feature_bullets: DESIGN YOU CAN TRUST – The 13’’ Yoga wheel is made out of a very durable plastic resin that is tough, impact resistant and has excellent stability under load, up to 440 pounds. Moreover, your palms, back and feet benefit from the textured mat-like cushion for an noticeable sense of comfort and secure grip
OPEN UP BEAUTIFULLY – Stretch and fully open your chest, shoulder, back and hips, with ease. The Yoga EVO Wheel will support your poses, transforming your practice starting straight from the warm-up

CHALLENGE YOURSELF - You can use this wheel as a prop to build core strength and to test and improve your balance. It’s perfect for Dharma Yoga. For more heat, spice up classic postures, modifying them by placing the wheel under one foot or hand

DEEPEN YOGA POSES – The Yoga EVO Yoga Wheel is the ultimate yoga prop to help you achieve your yoga goals. The wheel assists you in backbends or inversions, as it props the neck and shoulders and gives you stability
REST & RELAX – The wheel is perfect for releasing muscle tension after a long day, as well as to restore your back. Use it to alleviate back pain and reverse poor posture
